players.name: Alice
memory: Charlie: "Diana is the mafioso. We need to vote her out now to protect the town."
Diana: "Diana is not the mafioso. Charlie is trying to deflect suspicion from himself by accusing me too quickly."
Charlie: "Diana is lying to save herself. Bob is dead because of her, and I have proof. Alice, please help us vote her out before the mafia kills again."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
